chapter.description: The section on the Bankruptcy Code that sets out the rules and procedures for a particular type of bankruptcy. Possible Values: 7, 11, 13, 12, and 9.

status.description: Bankruptcy status. Possible values: Petition, Discharged, DebtReaffirmation, DebtReaffirmationRescinded, PlanConfirmed, PlanCompleted, Withdrawn.

statementOption.description: Statement option. Possible Values: RegularBillingStatement,  BankruptcyBillingStatement
